description.value: A CodeSystem to identify the type of prescription

purpose.value: A CodeSystem to identify the type of prescription

display.value: General Practitioner Prescribing

definition.value: Medical prescriber use 0101

display.value: Intentionally left blank
Nurse Practitioner Prescribing

definition.value: Nurse prescriber use either 0104 or 0105 depending upon qualification of nurse

display.value: Hospital Prescribing

definition.value: Out of scope for EPS

display.value: Dental Prescribing

definition.value: Out of scope for EPS

display.value: Supplementary Prescriber Prescribing

definition.value: Use appropriate prescription type depending upon type of prescriber eg 0108, 0113, 0114, 0116, 0117, 0124

display.value: General Practitioner Prescribing: Private

definition.value: Private prescribing not in scope for EPS

display.value: Extended Formulary Prescriber

definition.value: ‘Extended Formulary’ Nurse Prescribers no longer exist. A nurse prescriber would use 0104 or 0105 depending upon their qualification
